alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Burnett; Douglas; Iron; Price; Sawyer; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued May 14 at 10:50PM CDT until May 15 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS POSSIBLE MONDAY... Dry conditions are forecast Monday with gusty winds. Westerly winds of 8 to 15 mph with gusts to 20 mph. Some areas may see a few gusts to 25 mph in the afternoon. A Red Flag Warning may be needed. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM CDT MONDAY THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR NORTHWEST WISCONSIN... * AFFECTED AREA...In Wisconsin, Douglas, Bayfield, Ashland, Iron, Burnett, Washburn, Sawyer and Price. * WINDS...West 5 to 12 mph. Gusts as high as 20 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 14 percent. * TEMPERATURES...High temperatures in the middle and upper 70s. * IMPACTS...Any fires may grow and spread quickly.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Bayfield; Burnett; Douglas; Iron; Price; Sawyer; Washburn
